meaningMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>push</kanji>, and this verb means things like <vocabulary>to hold something down</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to grasp something</vocabulary>. This verb is pretty versatile, and you can use it if you're holding down a piece of paper, holding a cloth to a wound, or grasping a concept.
readingMnemonic: This has the same reading as the kanji you learned, so hopefully you can read this on your own.
